title: Does my phone support FM radio? If yes, how do I save manually found stations?
answer:
Yes, your phone supports FM radio. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112791) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112792)

 Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112793) to display the station list. You can then touch the stars to save the corresponding stations as your favorites. Alternatively, when you are listening to a station, you can touch a star at the bottom of the screen to add the station to your favorites list.
